Html:
Hello guys,

    Is there any way to put a background image or picture to a worksheet ?

I need this feature in a way that the generated excel file will be of like a fill-up form,

the background image is a scanned document of a fill-up form, then the appropriate cells

contains values allained to the fill-up portions of the background image. just like this.

 

found that this feature is available in Visual Studio

http://blogs.technet.com/heyscriptingguy/archive/2007/09/04/how-can-i-add-a-background-picture-to-an-excel-worksheet.aspx

Adding as a feature request so others can vote.

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=11641
Thank you KOYAMA,  I hope that my feature request is clear enough, anyway still looking for other options,
